analyzed: śāli ādi anna utpatti hetu bhūtā vṛṣṭiḥ iva tathā ca smṛtiḥ agnau prāsta āhutiḥ

iti
guṇāḥ śama ādayaḥ jñānāt śama ādibhyaḥ tathā jña tā
parasparam vivardhante te abja sarasī iva
yugapad paraspara vṛddhi anurūpa dṛṣṭānta upanyāsāya uktam eva punar āha

original: guṇā iti | te abjasarasī ivetyubhayatrāpi pragṛhyatvādasaṃdhiḥ abjaiḥ sarasaḥ
analyzed: guṇāḥ iti te abja sarasī iva iti ubhayatra api pragṛhya tvāt asaṃdhiḥ abjaiḥ sarasaḥ
śaitya saugandhya śobhā ādi guṇaiḥ vṛddhiḥ atra vivakṣitā
jñānam sat puruṣa ācārāt jñānāt sat puruṣa kramaḥ
parasparam gatau vṛddhim jñāna sat puruṣa kramau
evam jñāna sat ācārayoḥ api paraspara vṛddhi hetu tā iti āha jñānam iti
śama prajñā ādi nipuṇa puruṣa atha krameṇa ca
abhyaset puruṣaḥ dhīmān jñāna sat puruṣa kramau

original: śamena prajñāmahāpuruṣatādinā ca nipuṇo yaḥ puruṣārthaḥ
analyzed: śamena prajñā mahāpuruṣa tā ādinā ca nipuṇaḥ yaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ
śravaṇa ādi prayatnaḥ tad krameṇa jñāna sat ācārau abhyaset
na yāvat samam abhyastau jñāna sat puruṣa kramau
ekaḥ api na etayoḥ tāta puruṣasya iha sidhyati
yathā kalama rakṣiṇyā gītyā vitata tālayā
khaga utsādena sahitam gītānandaḥ prasādhyate
vivṛddhi phalam api tayoḥ tulya kālam eva bhavati iti sa dṛṣṭāntam āha yathā iti
dvābhyām pakva śāli kṣetra rakṣiṇyāḥ striyāḥ khaga utsādana aṃśe
vyāpāra antara ākartryā api vitata kara tāla dhvani yuktayā gītyā
ānuṣaṅgika khaga utsādena tulya kālaḥ gītānandaḥ pravartate
jñāna sat puruṣa iha ābhyām akartrā kartṛ rūpiṇā
tathā puṃsā niricchena samam āsādyate padam
tathā jñāna vighna rāga māna ādi nirāsa aṃśe niricchena atas eva akartrā api
jñāna sādhana śravaṇa sat ācārābhyām anuṣṭhitābhyām
tanmātra kartṛ rūpiṇām puṃsām ānuṣaṅgika vighna nirāsena samam
parama padam āsādyate  /
sat ācāra kramaḥ proktaḥ mayā evam raghunandana
tathā upadiśyate samyak evam jñāna kramaḥ adhunā

original: yathā evaṃprakāro'yaṃ sadācārakramo mayā proktastathā adhunā uttaraprakaraṇe
analyzed: yathā evaṃprakāraḥ ayam sat ācāra kramaḥ mayā proktaḥ tathā adhunā uttara prakaraṇe
jñāna kramaḥ upadiśyate iti vakṣyamāṇa pratijñā
idam yaśasyam āyuṣyam puruṣa artha phala pradam
tajjñāt āptāt ca sat śāstram śrotavyam kila dhīmatā
sādhana kalāpa upadeśam phala kīrtanā upasaṃharati idam ityādinā kila iti
sāṃpradāyika artha prasiddhau
śrutvā tvam buddhi nairmalyāt balāt yāsyasi tat padam
yathā kataka saṃśleṣāt prasādam kaluṣam payaḥ
balāt iti sādhana prabhāva uktiḥ prasādam nairmalyam
vidita vedyam idam hi manaḥ mune
rvivaśam eva hi yāti param padam
yat avabuddham akhaṇḍitam uttamam
tad avabodha vaśāt na jahāti hi
muneḥ prakṛta sādhana saṃpattyā manana śīlasya manaḥ vidita vedyam

original: sattadbalādvivaśaṃ paraṃ padamanicchadapi yāti | na kevalaṃ

avabodha vaśāt avabodha adhīna tvāt avabodha ātmaka carama vṛtti iddha tvāt iti yāvat
avadhūya ajñāna tat kāryam buddham jāgarūkam akhaṇḍitam uttamam yat padam

original: tanmano na jahāti | ajñānatatkāryāntaraiḥ samaṃ bhādhata evetyarthaḥ | hīti
